Start your journey as a tourist and explore a world full of hit music and Japanese culture. Build a Valley Estate, acquire awe-inspiring homes, and display your prized car collection in fully Customizable Garages. Cruise the roads with your friends and join Car Meets around Japan, unleash your imagination with EventLab and build together in Horizon CoLab.

title: Peak
summary: Peak is an online co-op climbing game where the slightest mistake can spell your doom. As a group of lost nature scouts, your only hope of rescue from a mysterious island is to scale the mountain at its center. Do you have what it takes to reach the PEAK?

title: Heretic + Hexen
summary: Heretic + Hexen is a remastered version of the games Heretic: Shadow of the Serpent Riders, Hexen: Beyond Heretic and Deathkings of the Dark Citadel. It includes quality of life improvements (native widescreen, engine fixes, interface tweaks...), reworked local and online multiplayer, as well as new episodes - Heretic: Faith Renewed and Hexen: Vestiges of Grandeur.

title: Zero Parades: For Dead Spies
summary: From ZA/UM comes ZERO PARADES: For Dead Spies ‚Äì a story-rich espionage RPG. You're a brilliant but tormented operant on a desperate assignment. Pick up the pieces of your broken network, untangle a bloody web of intrigue at the End of History, and prove yourself on the big stage or blow it all up ‚Äì again.

title: Fallout 4: Anniversary Edition
summary: The base game, six official add-ons, and over 150 pieces of Creation Club content get bundled together in one neat package in celebration of Fallout 4‚Äôs 10th anniversary.

title: Halo: Campaign Evolved
summary:
Experience Where the Legend Begins

Halo: Campaign Evolved is a faithful yet modernized remake of Halo: Combat Evolved‚Äôs campaign. Experience the original story rebuilt with high-definition visuals, updated cinematics, and refined controls, plus three brand-new prequel missions featuring the Master Chief and Sgt. Johnson. A broader arsenal of weapons, vehicles, enemies, and gameplay-modifying ‚ÄúSkulls‚Äù ‚Äì optional modifiers that change combat in fun and challenging ways ‚Äì add fresh tactics and endless replayability.

title: The Free Shepherd
summary: Run fast and free as a sheepdog in a beautiful but troubled world. Herd masses of lost sheep to a secret refuge. Discover a mysterious calamity that only you can stop.

title: Decrepit
summary: Decrepit is a first-person action game with souls-like combat where every death drags you back into the depths. Learn the dungeon, master the combat, and find your way out of the forsaken castle.

title: No Law
summary: Welcome to Port Desire, a city that doesn't belong to anyone, but where everyone wants a piece. You‚Äôre Grey Harker, an ex-military attempting to live a quiet life after near fatal injuries in the field. All you want now is peace - but in a city of no laws, what you want isn‚Äôt always what you get.

title: Bradley The Badger
summary: Bradley, the beloved platforming icon, finds himself lost in strange new lands... and decides to fight back! Shape unfinished worlds with your game developer powers, explore a genre-bending story, and save your home in this unique action-adventure. Wishlist now and join Bradleys journey!

title: Star Wars: Fate of the Old Republic
4:Loop
summary: Created by Mike Booth and the interactive storytellers at Bad Robot Games, 4:LOOP is a tactical, four-player co-op shooter crafted for endless replayability and infinite ways to build the ultimate team. Together, if you can learn from your mistakes, you might just fail to save the world.

title: Ontos
summary: A sci-fi mystery set on the repurposed moon hotel Samsara. Uncover cryptic experiments, face unsettling encounters, and piece together a mind-bending narrative. The deeper you go, the more the truth unravels as you confront the ultimate question: What is reality?

title: Order of the Sinking Star
summary: From director Jonathan Blow (Braid, The Witness), Order of the Sinking Star is a narrative adventure set in a realm of magic and enigma. Solve over 1000 interconnected, hand-crafted puzzles, discover unique playable heroes, master evolving gameplay mechanics, and decipher a grand mystery.

title: Gang of Dragon
summary: A new action-adventure game from game creator Toshihiro Nagoshi, set in the streets of Shinjuku, Tokyo. Starring Ma Dong-seok as Shin Ji-seong, the story unfolds with heated and intense human drama across Shinjuku, including Kabukicho ‚Äî one of Japan‚Äôs largest entertainment districts.

title: Tomb Raider: Catalyst
summary: Set in the wake of a mythical cataclysm that has unleashed ancient secrets and awakened mysterious guardian forces, Tomb Raider: Catalyst follows Lara Croft on a new adventure across Northern India.

title: Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis
summary: Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis is a reimagining of Lara Croft‚Äôs 1996 genre-defining game with visuals powered by Unreal Engine 5, modern gameplay, and new surprises that honor the spirit of the original.

title: Star Wars: Galactic Racer
summary: STAR WARS: Galactic Racer is a runs-based, high-stakes reinvention of racing born in the lawless Outer Rim. With the Empire gone and the galaxy rebuilding, The Galactic League is created: an underground, unsanctioned circuit where syndicates bankroll chaos and champions are forged.

title: Highguard
summary: From the creators of Apex Legends and Titanfall, comes Highguard: a PvP raid shooter where players will ride, fight, and raid as Wardens, arcane gunslingers sent to fight for control of a mythical continent.

title: Kena: Scars of Kosmora
summary: In Kena: Scars of Kosmora, Kena is older and renowned as a Spirit Guide. In hopes of finding answers to the affliction she has endured all her life, Kena travels to the mysterious island of Kosmora. Home to distinct cultures and regions, Kosmora is full of buried secrets from a tragic past.

title: Project Windless
summary:
Project Windless is a single-player open-world action RPG set in the universe of the acclaimed Korean fantasy novel series The Bird That Drinks Tears.

Step into a mythic age as a mighty Rekon warrior and journey across a breathtaking, war-torn world. Stand against overwhelming odds, forge alliances, and wage war across massive battlefields to unite a fractured land and give birth to a new kingdom.

title: Metal Gear Solid Master Collection: Volume 2
summary: This second installment to the collection features ‚ÄúMetal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots‚Äù and ‚ÄúMetal Gear Solid: Peace Walker (HD Collection version),‚Äù and also a digital soundtrack and "Metal Gear: Ghost Babel" as bonus content.

title: Castlevania: Belmont's Curse
summary: Crimson Curse ‚ÄîWill Your Fate Bloom in Despair or Salvation. Set 23 years after Castlevania Dracula's Curse - follow a young Belmont's journey in an all new 2D Action-Exploration title from KONAMI, Evil Empire and Motion Twin.

title: John Wick
summary: This new John Wick video game will feature an original gameplay narrative set in the John Wick timeline years before the Impossible Task and will deliver on the signature style and unique elements fans expect from a John Wick mission, including a hard-hitting gun-fu combat system, jaw-dropping camerawork, intense driving experiences, cinematic storytelling, and a bold range of atmospherically immersive environments.
